name: Delete Rule in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
description: A rule has been deleted in the Windows Firewall exception list.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:(2006 OR 2033) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.ModifyingApplication:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Ss][Vv][Cc][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR winlog.event_data.ModifyingApplication:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:(2006 OR 2033) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.ModifyingApplication:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe OR winlog.event_data.ModifyingApplication:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*))))`
